Title: Requires person convicted of an alcohol related driving offense to carry no fewer than two single use disposable breathalyzers
Summary: Requires person convicted of an alcohol related driving offense to carry no fewer than two single use disposable breathalyzers.
LawCode: Amd ยง1193, V & T L; add ยง132, ABC L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring persons convicted of an alcohol related driving offense to carry disposable breathalyzers; and to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to requiring certain establishments to make disposable breathalyzers available to customers
